## Remarks This enumeration is used by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlPaint.DrawCaptionButton%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
Caption buttons are the system buttons usually found on the rightmost side of a form's title bar.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates the use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlPaint.DrawCaptionButton%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and the CaptionButton enumeration. To run this example paste the following code in a form containing a Button named Button1. The form should import the System.Windows.Forms and System.Drawing namespaces. Ensure the button's Paint event is associated with the event-handling method in this example.
